questions.describe: Which is available when creating list views? (Choose 2)

answerOptions.describe: List views can be filtered by record ownership
List views can be filtered by tags
List views can be filtered using AND, OR and NOT filters
List views can be filtered by record owner profile

questions.describe: When doing a search for reports, what are the only two fields on which one can search?

answerOptions.describe: Created By and Report Title
Report Type and Create By
Report Type and Description
Report Name and Description

questions.describe: When advanced currency management is first enabled, the existing exchange rates

answerOptions.describe: Are left untouched
Are converted to the organization's default currency
Become inactive until an administrator reactivates them
Automatically become the first set of dated exchange rates

questions.describe:
A company has two different sales divisions national sales and international sales. Some of
the processes are the same, but the internal sales organization has more requirements to
gather during the sales process and there are more stages when trying to close deals.
What would you use for separating flow

answerOptions.describe: Roles
Page layouts
Record types
Multi‐select picklists

questions.describe:
An administrator is creating two picklist fields: Automobile Manufacturer (Nissan, Ford,
Mercedes‐Benz) and Automobile Model Mustang, S600.
Is it possible to link the two fields together such that the Automobile Manufacturer field
could influence the choices available in the Automobile Model field?
dependent picklist
controlling picklist
fields
fields

answerOptions.describe: Yes, the Automobile Manufacturer is a controller picklist, and Automobile Model is a
Yes, the Automobile Manufacturer is a dependent picklist, and Automobile Model is a
No, a relationship between the two fields is NOT possible because they are both custom
No, a relationship between the two fields is NOT possible because they are both picklist

questions.describe:
What does the presentation assembly feature do?
*Choose 2 answers*

answerOptions.describe: Searches and previews slides or presentations
Drag and drop slides or presentations into the assembly pane
Previews slide animations
Edits slide content

questions.describe:
Which statement is true regarding the capabilities of formula fields?
*Choose 2 answers*

answerOptions.describe: Formula fields are read only on record details pages
Formula fields can reference fields on a child object
Formula fields can reference fields on a parent object
Formula fields can reference themselves in the formula

questions.describe:
Dashboards give the user a snapshot of corporate metrics and key performance indicators. A
dashboard
*Choose 2 answers*

answerOptions.describe: Only consists of data from tabular reports
Can only be viewed from the home page
Does not use a standard report as it's source
Can only display information from a single report

questions.describe: What is the process for creating a Custom tab?

answerOptions.describe: Select a custom object, choose a tab style, and create a profile
Select a custom object, choose a tab style, and assign profiles
Select a custom application, choose a tab style, and create a profile
Select custom fields and objects, choose a tab style, and create a profile

questions.describe: In Salesforce, what does an administrator use to control a user's permissions?

answerOptions.describe: Users
Roles
Profiles
Sharing model and rules (granular)

questions.describe: Which objects cannot have sharing rules?

answerOptions.describe: Custom objects
Standard objects
Objects controlled by parent
Objects in a managed package

questions.describe: When a user performs a dashboard refresh, the dashboard refreshes for

answerOptions.describe: The user only
Anyone with the "View All Data" permission
The user and anyone below the user in the hierarchy
The user and anyone who has access to the dashboard

questions.describe:
After a record has been submitted for approval and locked, who may edit that record?
*Choose 2 answers*

answerOptions.describe: Administrator
Record owner
Currently assigned approver
User who submitted the record

questions.describe: Public groups may be used to do all of the following EXCEPT

answerOptions.describe: Share opportunities with other users
Allow users to delete personal accounts
set up default sharing access via a sharing rule
add multiple users to a Salesforce Content workspace

questions.describe:
Which statement is TRUE when an administrator installs an application from the
AppExchange?
*Choose 2 answers*

answerOptions.describe: The administrator may have the ability to test drive the application first
The administrator is able to see all the contents of the package
The administrator can customize the application after it is installed
The administrator cannot set the security for the application being installed
